cd ${PKG_ROOT}
go run ${WORK}/main.go
cd ${WORK}
cmp stdout want.txt

-- main.go --
package main

import . "github.com/efd6/dispear"

func main() {
	DESCRIPTION("uppercase")

	UPPERCASE("dst", "src")

	Generate()
}
-- want.txt --
---
description: uppercase
processors:
  - uppercase:
      tag: uppercase_src_into_dst_7c5bba02
      field: src
      target_field: dst
